summary: This is an email from the U.S. Department of Justice regarding a legal matter requiring the Jeffrey Epstein Estate to share private videos recorded at his properties. The email appears to be part of official correspondence about evidence sharing in the investigation.

events.title: DOJ Email Regarding Epstein Estate Video Evidence
events.description: The U.S. Department of Justice sends an email regarding a requirement for the Jeffrey Epstein Estate to share private videos recorded at his properties.

keyFacts: The U.S. Department of Justice is involved in requiring the Jeffrey Epstein Estate to share private videos.
The videos were recorded at Jeffrey Epstein's properties and are considered relevant to the investigation.
The email correspondence indicates ongoing legal proceedings regarding evidence collection from Epstein's estate.
The document shows official government communication about evidence sharing requirements.
The email date (December 18, 2020) indicates this occurred well after Epstein's death in August 2019.
